description: This file defines the main activity for an Android application using Flutter. It imports Flutter's Android embedding class and defines a subclass of FlutterActivity, which serves as the entry point for the Flutter app within the Android environment.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: The main activity class for the Flutter Android application, extending FlutterActivity to integrate Flutter's runtime.

methods.name: MainActivity
methods.description: Constructor for MainActivity; inherits from FlutterActivity. No additional implementation provided.
